channel.title: Welcome to the WinUtil Documentation! :: WinUtil Docs
channel.description: winutil-docs Welcome to the official documentation for WinUtil, your go-to utility for optimizing and managing your Windows environment. Whether youâ€™re an IT professional, power user, or regular user, WinUtil provides a comprehensive set of tools to enhance your Windows experience. Running the latest release of WinUtil You will first need to start a Powershell terminal as Admin. Now you can run the following command: irm christitus.com/win | iex [!NOTE] WinUtil is updated weekly as of the time of writing.
